title: 请问32X32的材质包是哪个文件
author: MineCraftNerd
txt_content: 下了1.0.0的CJB，要把一个文件夹放到32X32的材质包里，32X32材质包是哪一个文件？以前没用过CJB，不知道放在哪里。。求助= =

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Place the content of "Put in 32x32 Texture Pack" inside your 32x32 Texture Pack zip file (only when you have higher resolution texturepacks installed.
說明文件裡頭有說... 你如果有使用高清材質, 才需要把這些圖檔放進材質包中... 如果只用預設材質那根本不用管它... 

材質包在哪請參閱教程簡介
http://www.mcbbs.net/misc.php?mod=faq&action=faq&id=22

replies.author: MineCraftNerd
replies.txt_content: 不影响安装吗？里面好像有几个PNG，会不会造成黑屏什么的。。

replies.author: MineCraftNerd
replies.txt_content:
well 发表于 2011-11-30 03:24 
Place the content of "Put in 32x32 Texture Pack" inside your 32x32 Texture Pack zip file (only when  ...
谢谢指点，我已经明白了。
